reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**

 *RDA*/ Goon *Coil*/ 6 Wrap Single UD premade clapton *W*/ 60 
*Wicking*/ Full Cotton, Cotton Bacon v2 *Î©*/0.79 
          
**Testing**        

*Steep Time*/none *% Used*/ 5   
*PG/VG* maxVG *Nic%*/0          
            
**Mouth Feel** 

Flavor on the front of the palate. Somewhat thin mouthfeel.

**Throat Hit** 1/10           

**Flavor Properties**

Light, fluffy cake. Slight hint of coconut(?) or maybe just the faintest hint of anise. Brings a sweetness to the flavor that is really unique, and not very pronounced at all.

**Relatable Flavors** 

FLV Coconut due to the buttery coconut flesh flavor,                        
                            
**Off Flavors** 

The coconut/anise note may be a bit much for people that are sensitive to anise. It's a very much baked coconut/anise, not like black licorice.

**Position In The Recipe** 

Base. Meant to be built upon.

**Pairings** 

I can imagine this going well with FA cookie, CAP sugar cookie, some butterscotch or caramel flavors.            

**Notes**                

Pre-release sample  

**Rating** B+, this flavor is a decent flavor, but it isn't the best in its class.

*Please if your opinion differs, or you have another review for this post it in the comments. Will help the master list with multiple reviews in one spot.*
reviewsJson.author: skiddlzninja
reviewsJson.title: Pound Cake
